Uses of Interface
jcmdline.CmdLineHandler

    • Uses of CmdLineHandler in jcmdline

      Classes in jcmdline that implement CmdLineHandler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractHandlerDecorator
      An abstract class implementing the Decorator design pattern for decoration of CmdLineHandler subclasses.
      class  BasicCmdLineHandler
      Used to define, parse, and validate the parameters associated with an executable's command line.
      class  DefaultCmdLineHandler
      A Decorator class that implements command line options for the display of the command's usage.
      class  HelpCmdLineHandler
      A CmdLineHandler Decorator class that implements help options that display verbose help messages.
      class  LoggerCmdLineHandler
      A CmdLineHandler Decorator class that implements a logging option that implements rudimentary support for the java.util.logging package.
      class  VersionCmdLineHandler
      A CmdLineHandler Decorator class that implements a -version option.
      Constructors in jcmdline with parameters of type CmdLineHandler 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractHandlerDecorator(CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
      DefaultCmdLineHandler(CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
      HelpCmdLineHandler(String help, CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
      HelpCmdLineHandler(String help, String hiddenHelp, CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
      LoggerCmdLineHandler(OutputStream stream, CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
      VersionCmdLineHandler(String version, CmdLineHandler handler)
      constructor
